sentence.text: Interactions between COPAXONE and other drugs have not been fully evaluated.
sentence.negationtags: Interactions between COPAXONE and other drugs have <scope> <cue> not </cue> been fully evaluated. </scope>

sentence.text: Results from existing clinical trials suggest no significant interactions between COPAXONE and other therapies commonly used in MS patients, including the concurrent use of corticosteroids for up to 28 days.
sentence.negationtags: Results from existing clinical trials suggest <scope> <cue> no significant </cue> interactions between COPAXONE and other therapies commonly used in MS patients, including the concurrent use of corticosteroids for up to 28 days. </scope>

sentence.text: COPAXONE has not been formally evaluated in combination with Interferon beta.
sentence.negationtags: COPAXONE has <scope> <cue> not </cue> been formally evaluated in combination with Interferon beta. </scope>

sentence.text: However, 10 patients who switched from therapy with Interferon beta to COPAXONE did not report any serious and unexpected adverse reactions thought to be related to treatment.
sentence.negationtags: However, 10 patients who switched from therapy with Interferon beta to COPAXONE did <scope> <cue> not </cue> report any serious and unexpected adverse reactions thought to be related to treatment. </scope>
